name: Switchit
tagline: Feature-flag and A,B,C...n Test Switching System
body:
### Welcome to the home of Switchit, the open source feature flagging tool.

### Authors and Contributors
In 2016, Ken Sobieski (@sobi-wankenobi) founded Switchit.

The Switchit project name is courtesy of [Jeff Keller, Senior Copywriter, Quicken Loans](http://www.quickenloans.com/blog/author/jeff-keller)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://github.com/Sobi-WanKenobi/Switchit/wiki)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
